header.slogan: Hello there! I'm Simon Stijnen, a passionate developer based in Belgium. Welcome to my digital space.

section1.title: Get to know me
section1.text: I'm an 18 year old developer from Belgium. I'm currently studying at Vives Burgge.

section2.title: Showcasing websites of my talented friends. Explore their work!
section2.text: I'm currently working on a few projects. You can find them all on my Github page.

maxim.title: Maxim Claus
maxim.text: is a friend of mine who is also a developer. He is currently studying at Odisee in Ghent.

section2.footer: They are really talented and I'm proud to call them my friends.

section3.text: Feel free to browse around, and don't hesitate to get in touch. I'm always eager to connect with like-minded individuals and explore new opportunities. Thank you for visiting, and I hope you enjoy your stay!
